name: BIM360.storage.integration
description: Basic integration between Data Management API & Storage providers

FORGE_CALLBACK_URL.description: Callback URL of your Forge app, required for 3-legged OAuth

STORAGE_NAME.description: Supported: Box, Dropbox, Egnyte, Google, Onedrive

STORAGE_CALLBACK_URL.description: Redirect URI of your storage app, required for 3-legged OAuth

TRANSFER_ENDPOINT.description: AWS Gateway endpoint that triggers the AWS Lambda. For same-server transfer, use the suggested value

TRANFER_CALLBACK_URL.description: When AWS Lambda is done, it will callback using this address

MONGO_STATS.description: Mongo DB instance for usage stats data
